prompt: An elegant wedding monogram featuring the names 'Milot & Ermira' in a circular layout. In the center, use large serif letters 'M | E' instead of 'M&E'. Surround the initials with the couple’s names at the top ('MILOT & ERMIRA') and wedding details at the bottom ('BA PALACE • JULY 25 2026'), matching the style and font of a minimalist luxury wedding invitation. Ensure a transparent or clear background, classic serif typography, and a clean, symmetrical layout similar to traditional wedding logos.
style: minimalist, elegant, serif type, luxury wedding branding
font: classic serif (similar to Didot or Baskerville)
